p: In total, 5 µL of the extract (RNA) from each sample of RSV was used to perform the real time RT-PCR. The primers and probes used included RSV A Forward (5′-GCTCTTAGCAAAGTCAAGTTGAATGA-3′), RSV A Reverse (5′-TGCTCCGTTGGATGGTGTATT-3′), RSV A Probe (5′-6FAM ACACTCAACAAAGATCAACTTCTGTCATCCAGC TAMRA-3′), RSV B Forward (5′-GATGGCTCTTAGCAAAGTCAAGTTAA-3′), RSV B Reverse (5′-TGTCAATATTATCTCCTGTACTACGTTGAA-3′) and RSV B Probe (5′-6FAM TGATACATTAAATAAGGATCAGCTGCTGTCATCCA TAMRA-3′). Real time RT-PCR was perform using SuperScript III Platinum One-Step qRT-PCR kit (Thermo Fisher Scientific) with the following conditions: reverse transcription at 50 °C for 30 min (1 cycle); Taq polymerase activation at 95 °C for 5 min (1 cycle), PCR amplification 95 °C for 15 s and 55 °C for 30 s (45 cycles). The thermal cycling was conducted in the 7500 Fast Real-Time PCR System (Applied Biosystem).
